highlights: Custom Chart System: Built NasehLineChart from scratch using Flutter's Canvas API â€” renders 1000+ data points at 60 FPS

Client-Side Calculators: Fully offline calculation engines for metals, currency, and investment funds with financial-grade precision
Performance Excellence: Isolate-based heavy computation, RepaintBoundary optimization, 40-60% CPU reduction, <150MB memory footprint

overview.en: Naseh is an enterprise-grade investment management platform developed for investment channels in Egypt, operating under the Financial Regulatory Authority (FRA). The app provides real-time financial data, interactive charts, client-side calculators, and comprehensive market analytics.

technologies.stack: BLoC (complex screens) + Cubit (simple screens), rxdart for debouncing/throttling
Glassmorphism design system, flutter_screenutil, custom chart implementation
Custom NasehLineChart (built from scratch), fl_chart extensions
Arabic (RTL) & English (LTR) with separate themes (Montserrat/Cairo fonts)
Firebase Cloud Messaging, Flutter Local Notifications
Isolates for heavy computation, RepaintBoundary optimization, conditional animations for low-end devices

Home & Dashboard: Overview dashboard with quick access to all investment categories
Real-time Updates: Live price tickers for metals, currencies, and funds
Personalized Content: User-specific recommendations and quick navigation
Metals Module: Gold Prices: Real-time prices for 24K, 22K, 21K, 18K, 16K, 14K gold
Silver Prices: Current silver market rates
Price Charts: Interactive historical price charts with custom NasehLineChart
Metals Calculator: Client-side calculation engine for gold/silver values (works offline)
Multi-Karat Support: Calculates prices across all karat levels
Currency Module: Exchange Rates: Real-time rates for USD, EUR, GBP, SAR, AED
Currency Charts: Historical exchange rate visualization
Currency Converter: Instant bidirectional conversion (EGP â†” currencies)
Rate Alerts: Notifications for rate changes
Investment Funds Module: Fund Listings: Browse all available investment funds with advanced filtering
Fund Details: Comprehensive fund information and performance metrics
Performance Charts: Visual performance tracking with interactive charts
Fund Calculator: Advanced compound interest calculator with daily compounding
Projections: 40-year investment projections with visual charts
Search Module: Global Search: Search across all content types (metals, currencies, funds, certificates)
Recent Searches: Quick access to previous searches
Authentication Module: Registration: User account creation with validation
OTP Verification: SMS-based one-time password verification
Biometric Authentication: Face ID, Touch ID, Fingerprint support

Localization excellence: Arabic-first typography, mirroring, localized notifications, instant AR/EN toggle

technologies.stack: Clean Architecture (presentation + data, no separate domain layer)
dio + retrofit; API handler with interceptors, pagination, error mapping

Tablet-first UX: workflows tuned for 10" devices used by non-technical, often gloved personnel
Riverpod discipline: feature-scoped providers + cache invalidation keep data fresh across tablets
Data transparency: unified activity feed, profit/loss context, and privacy controls build trust

overview.en: Egg POS is a cloud-connected, Arabic-first tablet application that turns any Android tablet into a POS and operations console for egg shops run by non-technical staff and senior owners (60+). The experience is optimized for RTL reading, extra-large touch targets, and "one tap per task" flows.

completed: Production tablet builds installed in branches (private distribution)
Supabase multi-tenant schema, migrations, role-based auth
Riverpod-powered feature modules (inventory, analytics, logs, suppliers, privacy)
inProgress: Continuous UI tuning for seniors (contrast, iconography, gestures)

technologies.stack: Supabase tables, local secure storage for tokens
Cairo/Inter fonts, `flutter_screenutil`, custom `EnhancedSelectionCard`, Font Awesome icons

POS & Inventory Operations: Buy/Sell/Damage flows consolidated into animated `PosActionButton`s for muscle memory
FIFO batch tracking links every sale/damage entry back to purchase batches
Role-based auth (cashier, supervisor, owner) controls visibility of critical actions
Business Intelligence & Logs: Activity Logs Center merges purchases, sales, damage with infinite scroll + detail dialogs
Profit privacy toggle hides profitability data in shared areas; eye icon reveals on demand
Statistics dashboard surfaces daily volume, margins, supplier performance
Suppliers & Pricing: Supplier directory with Arabic names, contacts, outstanding balances
Price guardrails: last recorded price per SKU auto-fills POS forms, warns on anomalies
Reset & seed tooling: Supabase functions + CLI to spin demo data in under a minute
Accessibility & Localization: RTL-first layouts with mirrored animations and large tap targets for gloved workers
Explainability icons (InfoIconButton) describe business context in colloquial Arabic
High-contrast theme ensures visibility outdoors or in low-light back rooms

architecture:
App (Flutter) â€” Feature-based with Riverpod
â”œâ”€ features/
â”‚   â”œâ”€ auth/              # Email onboarding + Supabase auth
â”‚   â”œâ”€ inventory/         # Stock cards, buy/sell/damage flows
â”‚   â”œâ”€ analytics/         # KPIs, statistics, charts
â”‚   â”œâ”€ logs/              # Unified FIFO-aware log center
â”‚   â”œâ”€ suppliers/         # Provider management
â”‚   â””â”€ privacy/           # Profit toggle, kiosk modes
â””â”€ core/
    â”œâ”€ providers/        # Global Riverpod providers
    â”œâ”€ models/           # Typed entities (ActivityLog, Batch)
    â””â”€ services/         # Supabase clients, cache, helpers

highlights: Dual User Architecture: Separate experiences for clients and delivery personnel with role-based navigation
Offline-First Cart: SQLite persistence ensures cart survives app restarts and works offline
Real-Time Location Tracking: Background GPS updates every 15 seconds for delivery personnel
Advanced Google Maps: Multiple map implementations (location picker, orders map, delivery tracking)
Production-Ready: Live on Google Play and App Store with enterprise-grade features

overview.en: Enterpot is a production-ready B2B wholesale food distribution platform serving retail traders across Saudi Arabia. The app enables bulk purchasing, real-time order tracking, dual user experiences (clients and delivery personnel), and seamless payment processing through ClickPay.

technologies.stack: SQLite (sqflite) for cart, GetStorage for preferences
Google Maps Flutter, Geolocator, real-time tracking (15s updates)
Firebase Cloud Messaging, Flutter Local Notifications

Client Experience: Splash & Onboarding: Branded splash with kill switch check, 3-screen onboarding
Authentication: Login/Register (phone + password), OTP verification, password reset
Home & Discovery: Product catalog, categories, search, offers, sliders
Shopping Cart: SQLite-based offline cart (products + offers), quantity management
Checkout & Payment: Address selection, time slot, coupon codes, ClickPay WebView payment
Order Management: Order history, details, invoice download, real-time tracking
Profile & Settings: Profile editing, address management (with map picker), language selection
Delivery Personnel Experience: Order Management: Assigned orders list, order details, status updates
Maps Integration: All orders on map, delivery tracking map, real-time location (15s updates)
Delivery Flow: Navigation to locations, delivery code verification, invoice download
Shared Features: Notifications: Firebase FCM with deep linking, notification center, smart token management
Chat System: In-app messaging UI (ready for backend integration)
Kill Switch: Remote app control for maintenance/emergencies

architecture:
App (Flutter) â€” MVVM with GetX
â”œâ”€ presentation/        # Views, ViewModels (GetX Controllers), Widgets
â””â”€ data/                # Models, Repositories, Network client, SQLite DB

Cross-cutting: routing, theming, localization, notifications, flavor config
